name: Narrow One
description:
For best experience play here:  narrow.one

Battle players around the world with your bow and arrow. Defend your castle against invading foes. Steal the flag with the help of your teammates and win the battle. Narrow One is a multiplayer medieval-style bow and arrow shooter, 5v5. Explore the different maps and find the hidden shortcuts. Find cover and snipe other players from windows. Select from different weapons and find what bow suits you best. Narrow One has touchscreen & gamepad support.

Feel free to join our Discord to tells us about your feedback:

https://discord.gg/PhwWYkzfEw

Narrow One is developed by Jesper & Jurgen  (Pelican Party Studios).  

Pelicanparty.co - 2021
